Function reference

Finalfit helpers

finalfit is the main package for analysis of medical data. In all analysis, I repeat my tasks (almost same tasks in different studies). So I decide to make some helper functions with arguments I need.

ag_ff_glimpse()
Enhanced ff_glimpse Function with FlexTable Output
ag_ff_summary()
Enhanced version of summary_factorlist() function of `finalfit`
ag_ff_relocate()
Relocate columns of ag_ff_summary table
ag_ff_columns()
Adjusts columns for variables in ag_ff_summary table
ag_ff_labels()
Rename labels of a ag_ff_summary table
ag_ff_pull_summary()
Pull Summary Value from ag_ff_summary Output (to use as inline text)
ag_ff_regression_simple()
Uni- and multivariable regression analysis using finalfit::finalfit package
ag_ff_regression()
Perform regression analysis (including reduced MV) using finalfit::finalfit
ag_ff_pull_regression()
Extracts a value from an ag_ff_regression table

Flextable helpers

Same idea with the finalfit helpers. Some useful shortcut for redo coding while using flextable

ag_flex()
Create a Styled Flextable
ag_flex_header_labels()
Add Custom Headers (with n) to a flextable Object
ag_flex_center()
Center align the content of a flextable
ag_flex_hline()
Add horizontal lines to a flextable
ag_flex_title()
Add a title to a flextable
ag_flex_footnote()
Add a footnote to a flextable
ag_flex_abbr()
Add abbreviations to a flextable
ag_flex_save()
Save a flextable as a Word document

Folder/file templates

Some shortcuts to prepare/modify default template folder/filestructure

ag_create_project_folders()
Create Project Folders
ag_generate_template_quarto()
Generate Quarto Document Using Template
ag_create_excel()
Create an Excel File for Variables Name
ag_relabel_excel()
Relabel a column in a dataset using an Excel file as a source of label mappings
ag_relabel_vector()
Relabel a column using label mappings
ag_pull_cell()
Pull Cell Values from a Dataset

Biostats stuffs

For some quick looks in data

ag_shapiro()
Perform Shapiro-Wilk Test for Normality
ag_shapiro_results()
Calculate Shapiro-Wilk p-values
ag_fisher()
Identify Factors with Low Expected Cell Frequencies (for Fisher test)
ag_qq_plots()
Generate multiple QQ plots for all/selected numeric variables
ag_density_plots()
Generate Density Plots for Numeric Variables

Color management

To manage color choices

ag_theme()
AG Theme Customization
ag_make_colors()
Generate Dark-Light Colors
ag_colors_standard()
Standardized colors for across projects
ag_colors_scale()
Generate a scaled color palette
scale_color_karadeniz()
Color palette to use in color
scale_fill_karadeniz()
Color palette to use in fill

Misc

Utilities used in other functions

ag_qq_plot_single()
Generate QQ plots for numeric variables
col_table_header
Constants for package
